original_text: Now go and attack the Amalekites. Completely destroy everything that they have. Do not save anything. Kill the men and women, as well as their children and babies. Kill their cows, sheep, camels and donkeys.” ’
korean_text: 지금 가서 아말렉을 쳐서 그들의 모든 소유를 남기지 말고 진멸하되 남녀와 소아와 젖 먹는 아이와 우양과 낙타와 나귀를 죽이라 하셨나이다 하니

sentences.original_text: Now go and attack the Amalekites.
Completely destroy everything that they have.
sentences.korean_translation: 그들이 가진 모든 것을 완전히 파괴하라.

sentences.original_text: as well as their children and babies.
Kill their cows, sheep, camels and donkeys.
sentences.korean_translation: 그들의 소, 양, 낙타, 나귀를 죽이라.
